name: DodoGo!
description:
Adventure in the time of the dinosaurs. Save as many Dodo eggs as possible by leading them to safety.

Get creative with easy tools: build dynamic structures and modify the terrain with a simple touch of the stylus. Shape, brush, saw, dig and even use explosives!

Nearly 100 captivating missions, with bonus levels for a change of pace, and lots of surprises to discover!
